lead_paragraph: Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel saw red and turned the air blue at the Mexican Grand Prix on Sunday, before Formula One stewards promoted him to the podium and then dropped him off it again hours later.

headline.print_headline: Vettel Sees Red and Turns the Air Blue
headline.main: Vettel Sees Red and Turns the Air Blue

snippet: Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel saw red and turned the air blue at the Mexican Grand Prix on Sunday, before Formula One stewards promoted him to the podium and then dropped him off it again hours later....
